name: vscacn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c4, ctrg)))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ TopMod, c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3), (c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c4 ∈ TopRing))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctlm), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c4, ctrg)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod ↔((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c4 ∈ TopRing)∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctlm), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c4, ctrg)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod ↔((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c4 ∈ TopRing)∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctlm), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c4, ctrg)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cscaf, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod ↔((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c4 ∈ TopRing)∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3)))
⊣ c1 =(.sf ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c3)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cscaf, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c3)[Cn]c3))
⊣ c1 =(.sf ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c4)

comment: The scalar multiplication is continuous in a topological module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
